intro: Discover and solve fascinating 3D puzzles full of mystery and play with all controller modes!
description:
Machinika Museum is a mystery game where you discover beautiful and mysterious alien machines in an atmospheric, galaxy-spanning 3D puzzle game.

STORY
In a distant future, finding machines from unknown civilizations is not unusual, especially in a museum dedicated to them. Your job is to receive these devices and to understand how to repair them. 
But this time, something is different. You have not been given any information, and this seems to be rather urgent... What are these machines? Who sent them? Why won't anyone give you any answers? You will have to find for yourself which secrets and stories are hidden behind these mechanisms.

KEY FEATURES
•	Fully intuitive and playable controls: play however you want
•	Mind-bending Puzzles: use your sharp logic skills and your sense of observation
•	Mysterious sci-fi atmosphere and story: there is so much to unveil…
•	Wonderful visuals – cryptic alien machines have never looked better
•	Up to 3 hours of gameplay and mystery

CONTROLS
Machinika Museum has been fully optimized and adapted to give you the best playing experience. You can choose to relax and explore the game on your TV using one Joy-Con™ like a remote controller. Not playing on a TV? You can always put your Nintendo Switch™ on a table and play. Need to be mobile? The standard Handheld mode will give you what you need. Finally, if you are looking for precision and fluidity, the Touchscreen is the ideal mode.
To top it all off, you can switch from one control mode to another on the fly…

Welcome to the Museum!
